author: Tim O'Brien
title: Coronavirus: ‘Fundamental shift’ in electricity use, says Eirgrid
description: Consumers spreading breakfast time, cooking at lunchtime, preparing dinner earlier
content:
There is a fundamental shift in the way Ireland is consuming electricity as stay-at-home workers reduce demand in the morning peak but increase it at lunchtime, Eirgrid said.
Engineers at Eirgrids National Control Centre analysed electricity demand before an… [+3789 chars]
